name: Archipelago Sailor Simulator
description: Archipelago is a virtual ocean world where you can freely "sail" from one island to another using a sailboat or a motor-boat .  You start by creating your terrain which is randomly created and then you can add boats and structures (docks, cabins etc...). Then you can get onboard any one of the boats (or saiboat), modify the wind/wave conditions, time of day and go sail! Great for learning HOW to sail....especially upwind! You can also set up markers and race against the computer-driven boats.
